basics.name: Seandon Mooy
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: DevOps, Automation & FullStack expert with 8+ years professional experience. I buuild high performance, scalable applications that are fun to work on and easy to deploy.

highlights: On-Call engineer for messaging systems used by large enterprises and healthcare providers
Managed large Chef code base and complex technical environment
Built new CI/CD platform for development teams
Built, managed and supported multiple high profile client's production environments simultaneously
Developed scalable and reusable automation solutions using Chef with a team of engineers
Implemented zero-downtime deployments for web-scale applications in various languages within PHP/LAMP, Node.js/MEAN, Java/Tomcat, Rails, Django and Wordpress ecosystems
Built resilient, redundant and scalable systems using pure cloud, pure dedicated, and hybrid environments using Chef, SaltStack and Ansible
Point of technical contact for large & well known organizations including large national retailers, movie studios and web startups
Built applications from scratch against undocumented internal APIs to help boost productivity and team efficiency
Assesed and improved existing infrastructure (monitoring, statistics, security, phone system)
Built many webpages from artist designs (from photoshop to the web)
Managed many hosted services such as game CDN, leaderboards, etc
Implemented features & bug fixes to mission critical applications
Designed, created and implemented customer communications portal
Web development from whiteboard to production for GetCocoon.com flagship product
Developed and implemented a number of internal applications, including network and systems monitoring, call center visualizations, and tech-support knowledgebase
Responsible for mission-critical systems uptime, including 20,000+ user email system
